name: Royal Silver Tin Cinema
description: After opening Royal Silver Tin Cinema at the centre of the cluttered city, Rene realises that in the midst of cinema preparations like ordering in the popcorn, making cheap movies to screen at the cinema, and tailoring the custom design of the building, she forgot to promote the cinema and now there are no customers! She must now fight against her laziness, lack of wi-fi in the building, and the fact she doesn't own a laptop, to get people to come to the cinema to see the latest film she created on the big screen (well, mediocre-sized screen) at the Royal Silver Tin Cinema.
